about.content:
Hello there, I'm M3U. I'm a programmer and game developer/designer. I've been programming since I was 12.

I've worked with C, C++, C#, Java, Python, JavaScript, and Lua. I've used SFML, SDL2, OpenGL, Unity, Godot, ImGui, Pygame, NumPy, matplotlib, TensorFlor and Keras.

I do all of this for fun.
